abstract: Msgr. Thomas Brady was arrested Friday morning after he was accused of sexual misconduct by a 13-year-old boy, a spokeswoman for the Diocese of Brooklyn said.
snippet: Msgr. Thomas Brady was arrested Friday morning after he was accused of sexual misconduct by a 13-year-old boy, a spokeswoman for the Diocese of Brooklyn said.

headline.main: Retired Brooklyn Priest Is Accused of Inappropriate Conduct
